    VILLA FOR SALE IN SIDRA VILLAS I, SIDRA VILLAS

    Exclusive | Fully Renovated | Fully Furnished

    All bathrooms upgraded with travertine style walls and black accessories
    Brand new fully integrated kitchen
    Built in hob with extractor fan - induction
    Full floor to ceiling shelving unit for glasses & crockery
    Professionally landscaped with lush greenery including banana trees, coconut palms, Washingtonias, frangipanis, bougainvilleas, and lemon trees, supported by a full
    irrigation system.
    Outdoor areas illuminated with cabled lighting on a timer, LED strips on steps, and boundary lights matching the house.
    Fully equipped BBQ area featuring a Boretti Ibrido Top Gas/Charcoal BBQ, outdoor fridge, and a built-in bar with seating for eight. Complete with a wine cooler and
    custom furniture, including a round dining table with a lazy Susan.
    Bali-designed sunbeds, a cozy seating area with a sofa, chairs, and coffee table, all set within a serene, lush environment.
    Custom-built pergola with recessed ceiling, integrated fan, and 12 spotlights for ambiance.
    Bathrooms upgraded with travertine-style walls, black accessories, and floating toilets.
    Glass staircase with floating LED steps and a dramatic chandelier.
    Luxurious master suite with a 9m walk-in wardrobe and dedicated vanity area.
    haus & haus is delighted to welcome this magnificent, fully renovated and extended 3 bedroom plus maids villa to the sales market. With a complete renovation internally and externally, this is by far and away the most impressive villa of its type to come to the sales market.

    Features and upgrades include:
    All bathrooms upgraded with travertine style walls and black accessories
    Brand new fully integrated kitchen
    Built in hob with extractor fan - induction
    Full floor to ceiling shelving unit for glasses & crockery
    Professionally landscaped with lush greenery including banana trees, coconut palms, Washingtonias, frangipanis, bougainvilleas, and lemon trees, supported by a full
    irrigation system.
    Outdoor areas illuminated with cabled lighting on a timer, LED strips on steps, and boundary lights matching the house.
    Fully equipped BBQ area featuring a Boretti Ibrido Top Gas/Charcoal BBQ, outdoor fridge, and a built-in bar with seating for eight. Complete with a wine cooler.
